mapper.insert: insert into userinterest(userId, sidoCode, sigugunCode,dongCode,areaName) values (#{userId}, #{sidoCode},#{sigugunCode}, #{dongCode}, #{areaName})
mapper.select: select interestId, userId, sidoCode, sigugunCode, dongCode, areaName, count(areaName) as interestCount from userinterest group by areaName order by interestCount desc;
